job_history.work_description: Manage software development and infrastructure projects. Direct daily operations and oversee vendor relationships. Define project requirements and aligning efforts with clients and corporate needs and assess outcomes. Develop and see change management processes, release control, maintenance and support activities and employee training programs. Determine needs analysis for infrastructure and software requirements. Establish corporate policies pertaining to staff and employee usage of technology. Provides 24 x 7 technical support, Service Level Agreements (SLA's) and root cause analysis reporting.

Provided leadership in the firm's information technology department in the direction, planning and implementation of technology leading to the support and alignment of the Firm's business operation to achieve an effective, cost-beneficial and secure IT operations for over 350 users. Provided strategic and tactical planning, development, evaluation, and coordination of the IT Department. Oversee the integrity of all electronic records including information related to information security and data recovery processes. Facilitated communication between staff, management, vendors and other technology resources within the organization.

Responsible for planning and implementation of IT projects while managing and coordinating IT resources. Managed relationships with vendors and suppliers to ensure routine maintenance and that any possible problems are detected before they occur. Evaluated hardware and software acquisition to ensure compatibility and alignment with the Firm's objectives. Ensured all systems are properly updated and evaluated for routine maintenance. Assessed network and e-mail security to ensure network integrity.

education.university: University of Santo Tomas - Manila Philippines

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing IT projects, including planning, implementation, and coordination of IT resources, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has held leadership roles in IT departments, including Director of Information Technology and Manager of Information, showing strong leadership skills and ability to direct teams.

skills.name: Change Management
skills.explanation: Has developed and implemented change management processes, including release control, maintenance, and support activities, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Vendor Management
skills.explanation: Has managed relationships with vendors and suppliers to ensure routine maintenance and detection of potential problems, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: IT Operations Management
skills.explanation: Has overseen daily IT operations, including employee training programs, and has established corporate policies for staff and employee usage of technology, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Network Security
skills.explanation: Has assessed network and e-mail security to ensure network integrity, and has managed relationships with vendors to ensure routine maintenance, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Recovery
skills.explanation: Has overseen the integrity of all electronic records, including information related to information security and data recovery processes, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has facilitated communication between staff, management, vendors, and other technology resources within the organization, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has detected and resolved potential problems, including root cause analysis reporting, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Technical Support
skills.explanation: Has provided 24 x 7 technical support, including Service Level Agreements (SLA's), showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Cisco Certified Engineer
skills.explanation: Has obtained a certification in Cisco Certified Engineer, showing strong proficiency in networking and IT infrastructure.
